ygData.subject: Re: kill rattrap
ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: She screamed as the huge bot pulled on her. She was out of the arms of one bot and in the hands of another.  Her skin was burnt and still felt hot.

Squizzy::

She screamed as the huge bot pulled on her. She was out of the arms 
of one bot and in the hands of another.  Her skin was burnt and still 
felt hot. She was in pain and still felt panicked. She kicked at the 
bot who now had her,"LET ME GO!"
She struggled and strained to get free, but his grip was to strong 
for her. She was't a fighter, but at that moment, she was wishing she 
was.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> If you continue ignoring my attacks, Jason, I'm gonna get really 
mad. So post 
> damage.
> 
> ::DevilDuer/Oblitertron::
> 
> Two of Oblitertron's giant fingers close in on Squizzy, grabbing 
her and 
> giving a strong pull away from Arcangel. With any luck, he'd get 
her out of 
> Arcangel's grip, Oblitertron was very strong.
> 
> As he tugged, Oblitertron shoots his optics again at Arcangel.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer, leaking fluid from the shoulder, curses as Oblitertron's 
hand 
> blocks his line of fire, moving to get a shot. He aims carefully, 
firing his 
> stun gun at Arcangel.
